headline: Ameresco Announces 50MW Battery Energy Storage Asset to Enhance Resiliency and Energy Security
summary: FRAMINGHAM, Mass. & KINGMAN, Ariz., October 16, 2025--Ameresco, Inc., (NYSE: AMRC), a leading energy solutions provider dedicated to helping customers navigate the energy transition, today announced the development and commercial operation of a 50MW/200 MWh battery energy storage system (BESS), the largest behind-the-meter (BTM) project in Arizona. Achieving commercial operation in October 2025, this milestone marks a significant advancement in the state’s energy infrastructure. The BESS was dev

headline: Commercial Metals (CMC) Surpasses Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Commercial Metals (CMC) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +3.79% and +2.18%, respectively, for the quarter ended August 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?
